TIMESHEET.PERIOD_HOURS_SUMMARY_TEXT: You have a total of **{0}** this period
TIMESHEET.HOURS_NOT_MATCHED_TEXT: You have **{0}** that are not matched. All events must be matched before you can confirm your hours.
TIMESHEET.ALL_HOURS_MATCHED_TEXT: All your hours are matched. Are you ready to confirm the period?

TIMESHEET.UNRESOLVER_ERRORS_TEXT: You have {0} unresolved errors. You need to resolve them before confirming the hours
TIMESHEET.SPLIT_WEEK_TEXT: Selected week spans two months. Navigate between the first and second period using the command bar above.
TIMESHEET.MATCH_OUTLOOK_NOTE: **Please note:** You should try your best to matchthe event in Outlook, but in some cases it might be neccessary to manually match.
TIMESHEET.EVENT_NOT_FULLY_MATCHED_TEXT: Event not matched. We found a matching customer `{0}`, but not a project with the specified key.

PROJECTS.CATEGORY_OUTLOOK_TEXT: This project has a category in your Outlook.
PROJECTS.OUTLOOK_CATEGORY_INFO_TEXT: Here you can see the projects that have a corresponding category in Outlook.
PROJECTS.NO_TIME_ENTRIES_TEXT: No time entries registered for the project.
PROJECTS.TIME_ENTRIES_ERROR_TEXT: An error occured loading time entries for the project.
PROJECTS.PROJECT_KEY_DESCRIPTION: A unique identifier for the project. Keep it short, maximum 8 characters.
PROJECTS.NAME_FORM_VALIDATION: Name should be at least 2 characters long.
PROJECTS.KEY_FORM_VALIDATION: Project key should be between 3 and 8 characters long, and all uppercase.

CUSTOMERS.CUSTOMER_INACTIVE_TEXT: This customer has been marked as inactive.

CUSTOMERS.CUSTOMER_KEY_DESCRIPTION: A unique identifier for the customer. Keep it short, maximum 8 characters.

CUSTOMERS.KEY_FORM_VALIDATION: Customer key should be between 3 and 8 characters long, and all uppercase.
